name: Telegram group manager Mawar
description: Mawar adalah bot manajemen grup lengkap yang dibuat untuk mengelola grup Anda secara efektif dengan beberapa alat keamanan canggih & Cocok Untuk Semua Kebutuhan Anda ❤️

BOT_TOKEN.description: Telegram bot token get it from  @BotFather

API_ID.description: API_ID of your Telegram Account my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: API_HASH of your Telegram Account my.telegram.org/apps

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: For logs channel to note down important bot level events, recommend to make this public. ex: '-123456'

BASE_DB.description: Get From Here.https://www.mongodb.com/ (Same as MONGO_URL but give differant value for this)

COMMAND_PREFIXES.description: now you can set custom command handler for rose like : / ! ,
